name: Scarecrow Pierre
description:
Description: Scarecrow Pierre is a game prototype created by a small group of people who are learning as they go over a time period of 40 hours - including figuring out the game idea, creating game concepts, assets and code.

You play as a scarecrow and the race is on to whack the moles off your crops and scare away the crows!

The objective of this prototype was to learn as much about game programming and art as we could and create the sufficient code and assets in case anyone wants to continue on the project.

Code and assets available here: https://github.com/gamerswhocode/nody

Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys
Attack: Space Bar

Credits: Displayed in game.
